ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He who gives me food and gives me drink;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who gives me food and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who gives me food and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who gives me food and drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And the One Who feeds me and gives me to drink.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And it is He Who feeds me and gives me to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He Who gives me to eat and gives me to drink:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Himself gives me to eat and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Who feedeth me and watereth me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He who gives me food and drink;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He Who feedeth me and giveth me to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and provides me with food and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who gives me food and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And it is He Who feeds me and gives me to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and He gives me to eat and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He who feeds me, and waters me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And it is He who feeds me and gives me drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:79] and provides me with food and drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Who feedeth me) He provides for me and gives me my full when I am hungry (and watereth me) and gives me to drink when I am thirsty.
